short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Premier Search is your number one choice for a convenient and fast search engine option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Premier Search is a free Chrome browser extension that provides an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing, by configuring your Default Search to Premier Search. Enjoy fast search for any type of your requests. New horizons are about to be explored. This way youâ€™ll be able to find an answer identify any online request easily.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to install "Premier Search" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Premier Search and use the search program provided by the service, and you agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type preferred search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Premier Search will offer you first-rate custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.
Visit our website at https://premiersearches.com/
Read About us: https://premiersearches.com/about/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://premiersearches.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://premiersearches.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://premiersearches.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
